content: आगंतु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [आ-गम्-तुन्] {@--1@} Coming, arriving. {@--2@} Stray. {@--3@} Coming from the outside; external (as a cause &c.). {@--4@} Adventitious, accidental, casual; नियमस्तु स यत्कर्म नित्यमागंतुसाधनं <ls>Ak.</ls> --तुः A new-comer, stranger, guest; <ls>R. 5. 62</ls>; <ls>H. 1.</ls>
